title: Sigilist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You gain one Token for every new player that enters the graveyard.
- You may spend 4 Tokens to give a player/multiple players a Sigil of your choice:
- **Sigil of Fragility**: The player this is assigned to is struck with a Basic attack if they use their night ability. Attack Tier increases if they survive the attack.
- **Sigil of Vision**: The player this is assigned to is told of one existing non-revealed different faction role that is in town on even nights. (activates if given on even night)
- **Sigil of Chaos**: The player this is assigned to may use their ability on an additional player. Their ability fails the following night if this is done.
- **Sigil of Preservation**: The player this is assigned to has Powerful defense if they choose not to visit a player that night.
- **Sigil of Binding**: The player this is assigned to may reveal their role during the day to gain an additional vote for every two tokens you currently have. Their extra votes are constant and stay until death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not give yourself a Sigil.
- You may not give a player that already has a Sigil another Sigil.
- Sigils are permanent.
- Players given a Sigil are alerted of the Sigil they're given and its abilities.
